name: Switch
tagline: A lightweight switch-like widget using bootstrap and jQuery
body:
switch.js ====== A lightweight switch-like widget using twitter bootstrap and jQuery. This is good for simulating states like on/off, user/admin etc. #Files The files to be included are switch.css and switch.js and the required html markup that looks like this: ```html
``` #Dependency libs This has been tested with JQuery versions 1.9.1 and above and with bootstrap 2.3.2 . This should also work with Bootstrap 3.0 #Example Link: https://github.com/rash-mi/switch/blob/master/examples/switch-example.html #Using foundations If using the Foundation library, try using the buttongroup and small button classes correspondingly.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
